Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: initialize DAGent \(7 phases\)

Dependency-aware AI agent orchestration for autonomous software development.

Phases:
1. Foundation: Electron + React + TypeScript project setup
2. Data Model & Storage: Core types, JSON persistence
3. DAG Engine: Dependency resolution, topological ordering
4. Git Integration: Worktree management, branch operations
5. Agent System: Harness/task/merge agents, intention-approval
6. UI Views: Kanban, DAG graph, Context views
7. Polish & Integration: Auth, chat, undo/redo

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
